Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent a message posted in a chatroom or similar environment
    Author:
    Chris Schmidt

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Message.Reaction 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message(java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String text)
      Creates a message for the given username and text.

      void addReaction(Message.Reaction r)
      Add a reaction to this message
      void deleteMessage()
      "Delete" the message by removing the creator, reactions, and setting the text to "Message Deleted By Its Author"

      Get the username of the person who created this message

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String creator,
               java.lang.String text)
        Creates a message for the given username and text. Each message is assigned an automatically generated id (int).
        Parameters:
        creator - The username for the user who is creating this message.
        text - The text content of the message

    • Method Detail

      • getCreator

        public java.lang.String getCreator()
        Get the username of the person who created this message
        Returns:
        The creator's username

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Get the text of the message
        Returns:
        the message's text

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Get the id of the message
        Returns:
        the message's id

      • getReactions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Message.Reaction> getReactions()
        Get the ArrayList of reactions for this message
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of reaction values

      • addReaction

        public void addReaction(Message.Reaction r)
        Add a reaction to this message
        Parameters:
        r - The reaction value to add

      • relevantTo

        public boolean relevantTo(java.lang.String user)
        Check if this message is relevant to the user specified in the parameter. It is relevant if the user created the message or their name is in the text surrounded by @'s
        Parameters:
        user - The user for whom we are checking
        Returns:
        true if the message is relevant to the user

      • getReactionSummary

        public java.lang.String getReactionSummary()
        A summary (list of counts) of the reactions applied to this message
        Returns:
        the summary, the empty string if there are no reactions

      • shortString

        public java.lang.String shortString()
        A short summary including the creator and text. Limited to 50 characters long
        Returns:
        the short summary

      • deleteMessage

        public void deleteMessage()
        "Delete" the message by removing the creator, reactions, and setting the text to "Message Deleted By Its Author"

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String summary of the message. The id is surrounded by \0 characters to allow it to be easily parsed from this string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the message as a String

      • getMessageIdFromString

        public static int getMessageIdFromString(java.lang.String message)
        A utility method to extract the id from the toString created for a Message
        Parameters:
        message - A Message's toString
        Returns:
        that parameter's id
